title: "The Twilight Zone" television series logo
content:
....the TWILIGHT ZONE?

[http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/3/31/TheTwilightZoneLogo.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20130831095616/http:/upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/3/31/TheTwilightZoneLogo.gif)

Anybody? There is no clear answer on google and I thought some of you guys would know...

Thank you!
author: FranklinDemi

comments.content: The original logo was doubtlessly hand-drawn and isn't a font (or based on any particular font) of any kind. I know people have made fonts in that style since, but there's nothing canonical.
Thank you. Is there anything that can remotely resemble it?
You could always try tweaking a serif fonts such as [Vendôme](http://web.archive.org/web/20130831095616/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/scangraphic/vendome_sh_regular/)?
